quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Music expresses that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To love or have loved, that is enough. Ask nothing further.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Nothing is more powerful than an idea whose time has come.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Laughter is the sun that drives winter from the human face.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Kindness is the golden chain by which society is bound together.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Perseverance, secret of all triumphs.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Those who live are those who fight.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To love is to act.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: A man is not idle because he is absorbed in thought.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: People do not lack strength; they lack will.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Life's greatest happiness is to be convinced we are loved.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Nothing makes a man so adventurous as an empty pocket.

quote: There is always more misery among the lower classes than there is humanity in the higher.
author: Victor Hugo
